Title: Shalom
Plot: When Ziva accidentally witnesses a political assassination, she must surrender to the FBI and deal with the consenquences without Gibbs's help, who is now enjoying his retirement. She learns that the FBI is looking for her and escapes, while the NCIS team, leaded by Tony, must prove that Ziva is innocent. However, when things get more complicated, Ziva seeks help from the one person that always trusted her, Gibbs.
GuestStars: Muse Watson, Don Franklin, Brian Dietzen, Liza Lapira, Eli Danker, Eyal Podell, Saba Homayoon, Susan Santiago
